channel.title: Live Coronavirus Counter - India
channel.description: Recent content on Live Coronavirus Counter - India

item.description: .boxHolder { width: 16vw; height: 20vh; text-align: center; padding: 24px; min-width: 200px; background-color: #fff; color: #444; } .boxTitle { font-weight: normal; font-size: 2vh; color: #eee; } .boxCounter { line-height: 11vh; font-weight: bold; font-size: 7vh; color: #fff; } .stateBox { background-color: #00897b; color: #fff; } .countryBox { background-color: #6d4c41; color: #fff; } {{ partial "head.html" . }} {{ partial "header.html" . }} World Counters {{ range $.

.boxHolder { width: 16vw; height: 20vh; text-align: center; padding: 24px; min-width: 200px; background-color: #fff; color: #444; } .boxTitle { font-weight: normal; font-size: 2vh; color: #eee; } .boxCounter { line-height: 11vh; font-weight: bold; font-size: 7vh; color: #fff; } .stateBox { background-color: #00897b; color: #fff; } .countryBox { background-color: #6d4c41; color: #fff; } {{ partial "head.html" . }} {{ partial "header.html" . }} India Counters {{ range $.
